prop.name: gamePlatform
prop.desc: The electronic systems used to play video games.

prop.name: gameServer
prop.desc: The server on which  it is possible to play the game.

prop.name: actor
prop.desc: An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc., or in an event. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

prop.name: trailer
prop.desc: The trailer of a movie or tv/radio series, season, episode, etc.

prop.name: directors
prop.desc: A director of e.g. tv, radio, movie, video games etc. content. Directors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

prop.name: playMode
prop.desc: Indicates whether this game is multi-player, co-op or single-player.  The game can be marked as multi-player, co-op and single-player at the same time.

prop.name: director
prop.desc: A director of e.g. tv, radio, movie, video gaming etc. content, or of an event. Directors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

prop.name: actors
prop.desc: An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

Game.name: gameItem
Game.desc: An item is an object within the game world that can be collected by a player or, occasionally, a non-player character.

Game.name: characterAttribute
Game.desc: A piece of data that represents a particular aspect of a fictional character (skill, power, character points, advantage, disadvantage).

Game.name: gameLocation
Game.desc: Real or fictional location of the game (or part of game).

Game.name: quest
Game.desc: The task that a player-controlled character, or group of characters may complete in order to gain a reward.

Game.name: numberOfPlayers
Game.desc: Indicate how many people can play this game (minimum, maximum, or range).

SoftwareApplication.name: downloadUrl
SoftwareApplication.desc: If the file can be downloaded, URL to download the binary.

SoftwareApplication.name: softwareRequirements
SoftwareApplication.desc: Component dependency requirements for application. This includes runtime environments and shared libraries that are not included in the application distribution package, but required to run the application (Examples: DirectX, Java or .NET runtime).

SoftwareApplication.name: permissions
SoftwareApplication.desc: Permission(s) required to run the app (for example, a mobile app may require full internet access or may run only on wifi).

SoftwareApplication.name: processorRequirements
SoftwareApplication.desc: Processor architecture required to run the application (e.g. IA64).

SoftwareApplication.name: availableOnDevice
SoftwareApplication.desc: Device required to run the application. Used in cases where a specific make/model is required to run the application.

SoftwareApplication.name: featureList
SoftwareApplication.desc: Features or modules provided by this application (and possibly required by other applications).

SoftwareApplication.name: applicationSubCategory
SoftwareApplication.desc: Subcategory of the application, e.g. 'Arcade Game'.

SoftwareApplication.name: device
SoftwareApplication.desc: Device required to run the application. Used in cases where a specific make/model is required to run the application.

SoftwareApplication.name: applicationCategory
SoftwareApplication.desc: Type of software application, e.g. 'Game, Multimedia'.

SoftwareApplication.name: softwareVersion
SoftwareApplication.desc: Version of the software instance.

SoftwareApplication.name: storageRequirements
SoftwareApplication.desc: Storage requirements (free space required).

SoftwareApplication.name: applicationSuite
SoftwareApplication.desc: The name of the application suite to which the application belongs (e.g. Excel belongs to Office).

SoftwareApplication.name: memoryRequirements
SoftwareApplication.desc: Minimum memory requirements.

SoftwareApplication.name: screenshot
SoftwareApplication.desc: A link to a screenshot image of the app.

SoftwareApplication.name: countriesSupported
SoftwareApplication.desc: Countries for which the application is supported. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

SoftwareApplication.name: softwareHelp
SoftwareApplication.desc: Software application help.

SoftwareApplication.name: softwareAddOn
SoftwareApplication.desc: Additional content for a software application.

SoftwareApplication.name: releaseNotes
SoftwareApplication.desc: Description of what changed in this version.

SoftwareApplication.name: supportingData
SoftwareApplication.desc: Supporting data for a SoftwareApplication.

SoftwareApplication.name: requirements
SoftwareApplication.desc: Component dependency requirements for application. This includes runtime environments and shared libraries that are not included in the application distribution package, but required to run the application (Examples: DirectX, Java or .NET runtime).

SoftwareApplication.name: countriesNotSupported
SoftwareApplication.desc: Countries for which the application is not supported. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

SoftwareApplication.name: operatingSystem
SoftwareApplication.desc: Operating systems supported (Windows 7, OSX 10.6, Android 1.6).

SoftwareApplication.name: fileSize
SoftwareApplication.desc: Size of the application / package (e.g. 18MB). In the absence of a unit (MB, KB etc.), KB will be assumed.

SoftwareApplication.name: installUrl
SoftwareApplication.desc: URL at which the app may be installed, if different from the URL of the item.
